frozen_definition.name: SpendWise
frozen_definition.signal_source: Budget app research: 'most powerful software useless if too complicated to use' and users needing 'user-friendly interface'
frozen_definition.description: One-question-per-day financial mindfulness app that builds spending awareness through micro-reflections
frozen_definition.target_user: People who want financial awareness but find traditional budgeting apps too overwhelming or time-consuming
frozen_definition.pain_point_evidence: Users abandon apps due to 'too much daily maintenance' and find existing solutions 'overwhelming'
frozen_definition.differentiation: Micro-reflection approach vs. detailed tracking, focuses on awareness building over budget enforcement
frozen_definition.subscription_fit: Premium includes personalized questions, spending pattern insights, and partner sharing features

pricing.trial_strategy: Free basic questions, premium for personalized insights and advanced features
